full_summary:
### Governement Tender Announcement

#### Notice Type
This notice is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a Dual Motor Variable Speed Pedestal Buffing Lathe.

#### Contract Details
- **Contract Title:** W3555-233019 - Buffing Lathes (Tour de polissage)
- **Contract Number:** WS3533184283-Doc3669992031
- **Amendment Number:** 1
- **Solicitation Number:** WS3533184283

#### Tenders Expiration Date
The tender closes on 14 November 2022, at 2:00 PM EST.

#### Product Requirement
The tender requires One (1) Dual Motor Variable Speed Pedestal Buffing Lathe to be used in the Electroplating Work Centre at Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON. The product should have the capability to buff and polish metal components.

#### Procurement Method
This procurement will be a competitive process, and the selection will be based on the Lowest Price criterion.

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Contact
For further information, please contact:
- Kyle Davis
- Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- Phone: N/A
- Email: [davis.kyle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:davis.kyle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14370514](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14370514) 
- Region: British Columbia
#### Regions of Delivery
The product should be delivered to the Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON in British Columbia.
